tool_description: Identifies recurring patterns in etymological data across multiple words and languages to discover broader trends in linguistic evolution.

etymology_data.description: Collection of etymological analysis results from multiple words

pattern_types.description: Types of patterns to analyze: phonetic, semantic, morphological, borrowing, geographic

temporal_grouping.description: Group patterns by historical time periods

error_messages: Insufficient data for analysis: Provide at least 3 etymological data entries for pattern detection.
Invalid pattern type: Use valid types: phonetic, semantic, morphological, borrowing, geographic.
Invalid frequency threshold: Minimum frequency must be between 2 and 20.
Invalid correlation threshold: Correlation threshold must be between 0.1 and 0.9.
No patterns detected: No significant patterns found with current parameters. Try adjusting thresholds.
usage: Input etymological data from multiple word analyses, specify pattern types to focus on, and set detection parameters. Returns identified patterns and their statistical significance.

identified_patterns.description: List of recurring patterns found in the data

pattern_frequencies.description: Frequency counts for each identified pattern

significance_scores.description: Statistical significance scores for each pattern

temporal_distribution.description: Time period associations for each pattern

pattern_summary.description: Overview of major patterns and their implications
